page.title: 19A typical day
page.content: We interviewed a girl of 8 who lives in a modern house, which was built three years ago, with her mother, father and two sisters. She gets up at half past 7, has her breakfast at 8 and goes to school at 8.30 in Lancaster. Her mother and father go to work at the same time. Her father works at the White Land Trading Estate and her mother works at the university. When she has her breakfast at 8 o'clock she has cornflakes. At school her favorite games are adventure games. After school she plays her hobby, tennis. At tea tine she has all sorts of different things but her favorite tea is egg and chips. She watches television and at 8 o'clock goes to bed.
